column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We absolutely loved this place! The food was absurdly delicious
column3: Sunday night had the perfect crowd for a murmur to remind you that the restaurant was full
column4: but you could still easily have a conversation
column5: and the decor was very French/speakeasy cool without being trendy and lame. We started with the wedge salad
column7: followed by the traditional filets au poivre (absolutely to die for
column8: especially since we'd been married the day before and basically abstaining from meals offering more than 500 calories for the past 2 months)
column10: and fries (can't lose with that aioli). Service was impeccable
column11: and so was the wine. Highly recommended!
